attributes.action: Stop the BBC wasting License fee money on the Eurovision song contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Eurovision song contest is no longer relevant to the UK. All it does is further highlight the disdain with which the UK is held by the rest of Europe. Paying for this farce is just a waste of license fee payers money, Money that could be better spent on developing programs that showcase UK talent rather than giving airtime to 2nd rate acts that dissapear as soon as the show is over.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
